text: Ryan Caldwell (born June 15, 1981 in Brandon, Manitoba) is a Canadian ice hockey defenceman. He currently plays for the Schwenninger Wild Wings of the Deutsche Eishockey Liga (DEL). He has also played for the New York Islanders and Phoenix Coyotes of the National Hockey League (NHL), the DEG Metro Stars, Eisbären Berlin, and Thomas Sabo Ice Tigers of the DEL, and Ässät and Lukko of the SM-liiga. As an amateur he was an All-American defenceman and captained the University of Denver Pioneers to the 2004 NCAA Championship. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 births Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Ice hockey people from Brandon, Manitoba Category:Living people Category:New York Islanders players Category:Phoenix Coyotes players Category:United States Hockey League players
title: Ryan Caldwell
